channel.title: Eli Pariser on Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: [video] – The Filter Bubble – From Human to Algorithmic Gatekeepers
item.description: Web personalization and personalized recommendations are recently gaining more and more interest. Companies like Amazon, Google, Netflix, The New York Times, Facebook, Twitter, … already personalize their products in different ways. If you take Google’s search results as an example. Have you ever noticed that a friend of you gets different search results as you do for the same search query? If you never have noticed just try it out it’s really worth noting.
